name: Castelli Prologo VI Short Sleeve Jersey - Men's
description: Building on the greatness of the Prologo line, the 6th generation jersey doesn’t try and fix what isn’t broken but it does refine it. It's designed to be your favourite and feel like an instant classic with performance that's distinctly modern. Punto fabric offers outstanding moisture management, with a natural horizontal stretch.Quick drying Punto fabric actively moves moisture away from your skin, so you stay dry and cool all ride long.Mesh side panels and shoulders vent excess heat.Full-length YKK® Vislon® zipper makes it easy to self-regulate your venting.3 rear pockets and a zippered key pocket for extra security.Gripper elastic at the back keeps the jersey in place.
